column4: any one can please help me get firefox to see my plugins please? i am on firefox 3.5.4 and the guys from #firefox told me to speak with you guys due to problem with path
so you want to downgrade to firefox 3.5.3?
anything goes - aslong as i see flash videos heh
so what youre trying to do is to see flash videos with firefox using ubuntu?
have flash and java .. coz there are no plugins at the moment
I am not following, do you have flash and java, yes or not, what is the issue you are having with firefox under ubuntu?
the problem is that all the .so are in /usr/lib/mozilla/plugins/ but firefox is finding no plugins
the problem is that i have firefox 3.5.4 even though i downloaded from ubuntu's rep
try uninstalling firefox using synaptic and purge the software then reinstall it again
sudo apt-get autoremove purge firefox-3.5 right?
sudo apt-get remove firefox and then "sudo apt-get --purge autoremove" and "sudo apt-get clean"
you can use synaptic to remove the software though, i highly recommend you use synaptic to remove firefox
look at Scunizi 's post, you can try renaming ".mozilla" under your "/home" directory
im removing everything including the .mozilla directory and starting rom fresh
Scunizi   still it is saying no plugins :(
what plugin youre trying to use?
